words.en: Glorifies||[to] Allah||whatever||(is) in||the heavens||and whatever||(is) in||the earth||And He||(is) the All-Mighty||the All-Wise

translations.text: Sabbaha lillaahi maa fis samaawaati Wa-maa fil ardi Wa-Huwal 'Azeezul Hakeem

translations.text: Huwal lazeee akharajal lazeena kafaroo min ahlil kitaabi min diyaarihim li-awwalil Hashr; maa zanantum aien yakhrujoo Wa-zannooo annahum maa-ni'atuhum husoonuhum minal laahi faataahumul laahu min haisu lam yahtasiboo Wa-qazafa fee quloobihimur ru'ba yukhriboona bu-yootahum bi-aydeehim Wa-aydil mu'mineena fa'tabiroo yaaa-ulil absaar

words.id: dan jika tidak||bahwa||telah menetapkan||Allah||atas mereka||pengusiran||pasti (Allah) mengazab mereka||pada||dunia||dan mereka||pada||akhirat||azab||neraka
words.en: And if not||[that]||(had) decreed||Allah||for them||the exile||certainly He (would) have punished them||in||the world||and for them||in||the Hereafter||(is) a punishment||(of) the Fire

translations.text: Wa-law-laaa an katabal laahu alaihimul jalaaa'a la'azzabahum fid dunyaa Wa-lahum fil Aakhirati 'azaabun Naar

words.id: demikian itu||karena sesungguhnya mereka||mereka menentang||Allah||dan rasul-Nya||dan siapa||menentang||Allah||maka sesungguhnya||Allah||sangat/keras||siksaan/hukuman
words.en: That||(is) because [they]||they opposed||Allah||and His Messenger||And whoever||opposes||Allah||then indeed||Allah||(is) severe||(in) penalty

translations.text: Zaalika bi-annahum shaaqqul laaha Wa-Rasoolahoo Wa-maien yushaaaqqil laaha fa-innal laaha shadeedul iqaab

words.id: apa-apa||kamu potong/tebang||dari||pohon kurma||atau||kamu tinggalkannya||berdiri||atas||pokoknya/batangnya||maka dengan izin||Allah||dan Dia hendak menghinakan||orang-orang fasik

translations.text: Maa qata'tum mil leenatin aw taraktumoohaa qaaa'imatan 'alaaa usoolihaa fabi-iznil laahi Wa-liyukhziyal faasiqeen

translations.text: Wa-maaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaaa Rasoolihee minhum famaaa awjaftum alaihi min khailiinw Wa-laa rikaabinw Wa-laakinnal laaha yusallitu Rusulahoo 'alaa maien yashaaa'; wallaahu 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer

translations.text: Maaa afaaa'al laahu 'alaa Rasoolihee min ahlil quraa falillaahi Wa-lir-Rasooli Wa-lizil qurbaa wal-yataamaa walmasaakeeni wabnis sabeeli kai laa yakoona doolatam bainal aghniyaaa'i minkum; Wa-maaa aataakumur Rasoolu fakhuzoohu Wa-maa nahaakum 'anhu fantahoo; wattaqul laah(a) innal laaha shadeedul iqaab

words.en: For the poor||emigrants||those who||were expelled||from||their homes||and their properties||seeking||bounty||from||Allah||and pleasure||and helping||Allah||and His Messenger||Those||they||(are) the truthful

translations.text: Lilfuqaraaa'il Muhaaji-reenal lazeena ukhrijoo min diyaarihim Wa-amwaalihim yabtaghoona fadlam minal laahi Wa-ridwaananw Wa-yansuroonal laaha Wa-Rasoolah; ulaaa'ika humus saadiqoon

translations.text: Wallazeena tabawwa'ud daara wal-eemaana min qablihim yuhibboona man haajara ilaihim Wa-laa yajidoona fee sudoorihim haajatam mimmaa ootoo Wa-yu'siroona 'alaa anfusihim Wa-law kaana bihim khasaasah; Wa-maien yooqa shuhha nafsihee fa-ulaaa'ika humul muflihoon

words.id: dan orang-orang yang||(mereka) datang||dari||sesudah mereka||mereka berkata||ya Tuhan kami||ampunilah||bagi kami||dan bagi saudara-saudara kami||orang-orang yang||(mereka) mendahului kami||dengan beriman||dan tidak||Engkau jadikan||dalam||hati kami||kedengkian||kepada orang-orang||yang beriman||ya Tuhan kami||sesungguhnya Engkau||Maha Penyantun||Maha Penyayang
words.en: And those who||came||from||after them||they say||Our Lord||forgive||us||and our brothers||who||preceded us||in faith||and (do) not||put||in||our hearts||any rancor||towards those who||believed||Our Lord||indeed You||(are) Full of Kindness||Most Merciful

translations.text: Wallazeena jaaa'oo min ba'dihim yaqooloona Rabbanagh fir lanaa Wa-li-ikhwaani-nal lazeena sabqoonaa bil-eemaani Wa-laa taj'al fee quloobinaa ghillalil lazeena aamanoo rabbannaaa innaka Ra'oofur Raheem

words.id: tidaklah||kamu memperhatikan||kepada||orang-orang yang||(mereka) munafik||mereka berkata||kepada saudara-saudara mereka||orang-orang yang||kafir/ingkar||dari||ahli||kitab||sungguh jika||kamu diusir||niscaya kami akan keluar||bersamamu||dan tidak||kami taat/patuh||pada/untuk kamu||seseorang/siapapun||selama-lamanya||dan jika||kamu di perangi||niscaya kami akan membantu kamu||dan Allah||menyaksikan||sesungguhnya mereka||benar-benar pendusta

translations.text: Alam tara ilal lazeena naafaqoo yaqooloona li-ikhwaanihimul lazeena kafaroo min ahlil kitaabi la'in ukhrijtum lanakhrujanna ma'akum Wa-laa nutee'u feekum ahadan abadanw wa-in qootiltum lanansuran-nakum wallaahu yashhadu innahum lakaaziboon

words.id: sungguh jika||mereka diusir||tidak||keluar||bersama mereka||dan sungguh jika||mereka diperangi||tidak||menolong mereka||dan sungguh jika||mereka menolongnya||niscaya mereka berpaling||belakang||kemudian||tidak||ditolong
words.en: If||they are expelled||not||they will leave||with them||and if||they are fought||not||they will help them||And if||they help them||certainly they will turn||(their) backs;||then||not||they will be helped

translations.text: La'in ukhrijoo laa yakhrujoona ma'ahum Wa-la'in qootiloo laa yansuroonahum Wa-la'in nasaroohum la-yuwallunnal adbaara summa laa yunsaroon

translations.text: La-antum ashaddu rahbatan fee sudoorihim minal laah; zaalika bi-annahum qawmul laa yafqahoon

translations.text: Laa yuqaatiloonakum jamee'an illaa fee quram muhas-sanatin aw minw waraaa'i judur; baasuhum bainahum shadeed; tahsabuhum jamee'anw-wa quloobuhum shatta; zaalika biannahum qawmul laa ya'qiloon

translations.text: Kamasalil lazeena min qablihim qareeban zaaqoo wabaala amrihim Wa-lahum 'azaabun aleem

translations.text: Kamasalish shaitaani iz qaala lil-insaanik fur falammaa kafara qaala innee bareee'um minka inneee akhaaful laaha rabbal 'aalameen

translations.text: Fakaana aaqibatahumaaa annahumaa fin naari khaalidaini feehaa; Wa-zaalika jazaaa'uz zaalimeen

translations.text: Yaaa-ayyuhal lazeena aamanut taqul laaha; waltanzur nafsum maa qaddamat lighadiw wattaqul laah; innal laaha khabeerum bimaa ta'maloon

translations.text: Law anzalnaa haazal quraana 'alaa jabilil lara-aytahoo khaashi'am muta-saddi'am min khashiyatil laah; Wa-tilkal amsaalu nadribuhaa linnaasi la'allahum yatafakkaroon
